name: fft_backend
description: "Backend for the Finnish Foreign Trade Visualized application"

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fft_frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../fft_backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m 'Create new frontend build' && git push && git subtree push --prefix fft_backend heroku master

author: Joonas Partanen
